Generous range of side dishes for solo diner (really tasty too) and focus is on seafood. Grilled abalone was expensive at â‚©40,000 for 9 pieces, but delicious. So was the sea urchin seaweed soup. The famous hairtail fish was only included in set menus for more than 2 persons so come on a large group if you'd like to try that. After paying, show your receipt at the café on ground floor for a free Americano coffee. Parking is available and free just outside restaurant. Walked in on a mornig at 9.45, because the Naver site had said it was open from 9.
the decor and style alludes to a cafe style which is comfy to reside in a while.
but being let in early from the owner there was about nothing we can order, ita nowadays really just a ìˆ ì§‘ I would say. No point in coming here for anything else than that.
I was disappointed.
Cute cafe by the sea. Staff is super friendly and even gave me a free water. Peanut ice cream is standard but had adorable presentation.
